# Summary of K2 Program GO20001

Title: Dynamics in Algols and in Beta Lyr

PI: Montgomery, Michele M. (UCF)
CoIs: Richard Olenick (University of Dallas)

For K2 Campaigns 20, we request long cadence observations of 62 eclipsing binaries (EBs), one of which is the multiplicity system Beta Lyr (2MASS J04484882+2055085) and the rest are EBs of the Algol type. All have been checked to ensure they fall on active silicon. Science goals we aim to achieve from the K2 light curves (LCs) are to find orbital periods and other parameters from model fits for newly observed systems, to confirm previously published observed system parameters, and to search for an elusive subset of systems that show multiplicity in their LCs.

# Targets requested by this program that have been observed (60)
